query:
SELECT 
  id,
  customerId,
  txid,
  amount,
  status,
  paidAt,
  createdAt,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, createdAt, NOW()) as segundos_desde_criacao
FROM pix_transactions
WHERE customerId = 480001
ORDER BY createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5
